short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspired by the wisdom of Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus every time you open a new browser tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stoicism is a school of philosophy that hails from ancient Greece and Rome in the early parts of the 3rd century, BC. It is a philosophy of life that maximises positive emotions, reduces negative emotions and helps individuals to hone their virtues of character.

This browser extension will feed small nuggets of wisdom from Marcus Aurelius, Seneca, and Epictetus every time you open a new browser tab.

Get inspired one nugget at a time.
